articles.title: Kim Jong Il Meets with Russian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Meets with Russian President

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, met with Dmitri Anatoliyevich Medvedev, president of the Russian Federation, in Ulan-Ude, the capital city of the Republic of Buryatia in Russia, on Wednesday.
					
					 Kim Jong Il exchanged warm greetings with Medvedev and had a talk with him.
					
					 The president warmly welcomed General Secretary Kim Jong Il visiting Russia by sparing precious time despite his tight schedule leading the building of a prosperous and powerful country in the DPRK on behalf of the Russian government and the people. He said that the visit would mark a particularly important occasion in further developing the Russia-DPRK friendly relations as required by the new century.
					
					 The third visit to Russia paid by Kim Jong Il in the new century clearly proves what importance he is attaching to the Russia-DPRK friendship, he noted, paying high tribute to Kim Jong Il who has made an immortal contribution to the development of the Russia-DPRK friendship.
					
					 Kim Jong Il expressed his pleasure of meeting with Medvedev and thanked him for coming all the way to Ulan-Ude to kindly meet with him. He gave his impressions of his visit to the Far East and Siberian regions under the great concern of the Russian government and people and amid their cordial hospitality.
					
					 The talk took place in a warm and friendly atmosphere.

articles.title: Talks Held between Top Leaders of DPRK and Russia
articles.content:
Talks Held between Top Leaders of DPRK and Russia 

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Talks were held between        Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, and Dmitri Anatoliyevich Medvedev, president of the Russian Federation, in Ulan-Ude, the capital city of the Republic of Buryatia of Russia, on Wednesday.
					
					 Present at the talks from the DPRK side were Kim Yong Chun, member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and minister of the People's Armed Forces, Kang Sok Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and vice-premier of the Cabinet, Kim Yang Gon, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Kye Gwan, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and Kim Yong Jae, DPRK ambassador to Russia.
					
					 Present there from the Russian side were Sergei Prikhodiko, assistant to president for external policy, Viktor Ishayev, presidential envoy to the Far East Region of the Russian Federation, Viktor Tolokonski, presidential envoy to the Siberian Region of the Russian Federation, Anatoly Serzhukov, minister of Defense, Igor Levitin, minister of Transport, Viktor Basargin, minister of Regional Development and chairman of the Russian side to the Governmental Committee between Russia-Korea for the Cooperation of Trade and Economy, Science and Technology, Valery Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and Aleksei Borodavkin, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs.
					
					 Medvedev warmly welcomed Kim Jong Il visiting Russia, noting that his Russia visit is of particularly important significance in promoting the mutual understanding, trust, friendship and cooperation between the two countries and putting the Russia-DPRK friendly relations on a new higher stage.
					
					 Saying that Kim Jong Il's appreciation of the changes taking place in the land of Russia during his long trip to the Far East and Siberia regions constitutes a great inspiration and positive support to the struggle of the Russian people, the Russian president highly estimated the contribution made by Kim Jong Il to steadily developing the bilateral friendly relations.
					
					 The Russian president extended kind salute to all the Korean people who are dedicating themselves to bringing about a new turn in building a prosperous and powerful nation till 2012, the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people.
					
					 The Russian president expressed support to the positive measures taken by the DPRK to defend the peace and security of Northeast Asia, develop the economy to suit the specific conditions of the country and improve the standard of the people's living. He expressed the belief that the Korean people would register greater successes in the building of a prosperous and powerful nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il thanked the Russian president and other central leading officials and the governments and people of different regions for kindly receiving him wherever he went and according him cordial hospitality and extended his regards to the Russian people.
					
					 He said he witnessed the successes achieved by the Russian government and people in the work to modernize the economy, bolster the defense capability and achieve social stability under the leadership of Medvedev and got better knowledge of the history and culture of Russia while touring several cities and units of the vast Far East and Siberian regions. He hoped the Russian people would enjoy prosperity in the future, too.
					
					 At the talks the top leaders of the two countries informed each other of the situation in their countries and appreciated with satisfaction the favorably developing bilateral relations. They exchanged their views on developing the bilateral relations and reached a consensus of views on all the issues discussed.
					
					 The two top leaders were unanimous in saying that boosting the bilateral friendly and cooperative relations with a long historical tradition is not only in line with the desire of the two peoples and their fundamental interests but is of important significance in developing Northeast Asia and defending world peace and security.
					
					 The Russian president reiterated that the Russian side would join the DPRK side in boosting the Russia-DPRK good-neighborly, friendly and cooperative relations and thus making a positive contribution to bringing greater well-being to the two peoples.
					
					 Kim Jong Il reiterated the determination of the government and people of the DPRK to make every possible effort to further develop the traditional bilateral friendly and cooperative relations in the future, too.
					
					 At the talks the top leaders underlined the need for the two countries to boost the friendship, equality and mutually beneficial cooperative relations in the spirit of the DPRK-Russia Joint Declaration inked in Pyongyang in 2000, the 2001 DPRK-Russia Moscow Declaration and the Treaty of Friendship, Good-neighborliness and Cooperation between the DPRK and Russia.
					
					 They expressed firm belief that the cause of building a prosperous and powerful nation in the DPRK and that of building a powerful state in Russia would surely be accomplished thanks to the two peoples' vigorous struggle for social progress and development. They expressed mutual support and solidarity with the cause.
					
					 The two top leaders had an in-depth exchange of views on regional and international issues at the talks.
					
					 At the talks they shared the view that the six-party talks should be resumed without any precondition at an early date to implement the September 19 joint statement on the principle of simultaneous action and thus accelerate the denuclearization of the whole Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Manifested at the talks was the will of the governments of the two countries to reject high-handed and arbitrary practices in the international arena and establish a fair international order in order to actively contribute to the peace and security in the region and the rest of the world.
					
					 The talks discussed a series of agenda items on boosting the economic and cooperative relations in various fields including the issue of energy including gas and the issue of linking railways and reached a common understanding of them.
					
					 It was decided at the talks to organize and operate working groups to put the above-said issues into practice and the two countries agreed to continue cooperating with each other in this direction.
					
					 The two top leaders expressed satisfaction with the results of the talks and further deepened their friendship.
					
					 Kim Jong Il invited the Russian president to pay a visit to the DPRK at a convenient time and the invitation was accepted with pleasure.
					
					 The talks proceeded in a sincere and friendly atmosphere from start to end.

articles.title: Russian President Hosts Banquet in Honor of Kim Jong Il

Russian President Hosts Banquet in Honor of Kim Jong Il

					 Present there together with Medvedev were  Alexandr Avramov, assistant to the president for regional policy, Sergei Prikhodiko, assistant to the president for external policy, Viktor Ishayev, presidential envoy to the Far East Region of the Russian Federation, Viktor Tolokonski, presidential envoy to the Siberian Region of the Russian Federation, Anatoly Serzhukov, minister of Defense, Igor Levitin, minister of Transport, Viktor Basargin, minister of Regional Development who is chairman of the Russian side to the Governmental Committee between Russia-DPRK for the Cooperation of Trade and Economy, Science and Technology, Valery Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, Aleksei Borodavkin, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Byacheslav Nagovitsin, president of the Republic of Buryatia, Matbei Gershevich, chairman of the People's Khural, Gennadi Aidayev, mayor of Ulan-Ude, Anatoly Sidorov, first vice commander of the Eastern Military District of the Armed Forces of the Russian Fe
					
					 deration, Vladimir Tsilko, commander of the 36th Combined Forces of the Eastern Military District, and other central and local leading officials and commanding officers of the armed forces.

					 Kim Jong Il spoke next.
					
					 The banquet proceeded in an amicable atmosphere overflowing with friendship.

articles.title: Speech Made by Kim Jong Il at Banquet
articles.content:
Speech Made by Kim Jong Il at Banquet

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il made a speech at the banquet given by Dmitri Anatoliyevich Medvedev, president of the Russian Federation, in welcome of his visit to Russia.
					
					 He said:
					
					 Respected Your Excellency President Dmitri Anatoliyevich Medvedev, 
					
					 Close friends of Russia,
					
					 It gives me great pleasure to revisit Siberia and the Far East Region of Russia, a friendly neighbor, after the lapse of a decade and meet with you.
					
					 Allow me to express, first of all, my heartfelt thanks to you for traveling thousands of kilometers to come to Ulan-Ude from Moscow, the capital city, warmly greeting us and providing us with such meaningful place today.
					
					 It gives us particular pleasure to visit your country for the third time in the new century and see for ourselves the achievements made by your people in building powerful and modern Russia.
					
					 The Russian government and people are registering many successes in the work to bolster the defence capability of the country and achieve the modernization of economy and social and political stability and working hard to establish a fair international order against high-handed and arbitrary practices under your leadership.
					
					 It is our sincere hope that the efforts of the friendly Russian government and people to defend world peace and security and build rich and powerful Russia will bear good fruits.
					
					 The peoples of our two countries have given steady continuity to the history and tradition of friendship along with the placid flow of the River Tuman.
					
					 We are glad to see that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries have favorably developed in various fields recently.
					
					 To steadily develop in depth the history and tradition of the DPRK-Russia friendship entirely conforms with the interests of the two peoples and is of weighty significance in defending the peace and stability in Northeast Asia.
					
					 We are convinced that the summit meeting today will undoubtedly mark an important landmark in boosting the DPRK-Russia relations in line with the aspiration and desire of the two peoples and turning Northeast Asia into the region for peace and cooperation.
					
					 We will in the future, too, make every effort to boost the traditional DPRK-Russia friendly and cooperative relations.
					
					 In closing, I, availing myself of this opportunity overflowing with the friendship, would like to propose a toast to the strengthening and development of the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries, to the good health of Respected Your Excellency President Dmitri Anatoliyevich Medvedev and to the good health of the dear friends of Russia and all those present here.

articles.title: Speech Made by Medvedev at Banquet
articles.content:
Speech Made by Medvedev at Banquet

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The following is the speech made by Russian President Dmitri Anatoliyevich Medvedev at the banquet given in honor of General Secretary Kim Jong Il visiting Russia:
					
					 Respected Your Excellency Kim Jong Il,
					
					 Respected friends,
					
					 The working-level meeting between me and Your Excellency Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, is just over.
					
					 Allow me to offer my thanks to you for having an effective exchange of views on the urgent bilateral and international issues and welcome all the guests from the DPRK to Russia once again.
					
					 The good neighborly relations between our two countries have a solid foundation. This is not merely because of geographical proximity and long-standing bilateral relations.
					
					 The cooperation between Russia and the DPRK has great potential.
					
					 To realize cooperation between the two countries will bring a lot of benefits including not a few economic fruits to our two peoples. 
					
					 Today I and Your Excellency Kim Jong Il agreed to further political dialogue and comprehensively develop working cooperation.
					
					 There is great possibility of cooperation for us in the educational and cultural fields, too.
					
					 The Russian center has already operated in Pyongyang for the last three years and students of the DPRK are studying and having training programs at universities of Russia.
					
					 Art groups of Russia made ceaseless performance tours of the DPRK and it has become a tradition for them to participate in the April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
					
					 The contacts between the regions of the two countries have become more brisk recently.
					
					 Documents on establishing sister relations between various cities of Russia and the DPRK are in the making.
					
					 Cooperation among Russia, the DPRK and the Republic of Korea in carrying out the grand plans in the fields of infrastructure and power has a great prospect.
					
					 I am convinced that to realize this cooperation would be beneficial to all our three countries and have a positive impact on providing favorable environment for dialogue and confidence-building between the DPRK and the ROK.
					
					 It is our common task to put an end to the confrontation between the north and the south that has lasted for more than half a century, I think.
					
					 We will in the future, too, contribute to seeking political and economic solutions to turn the Korean Peninsula and Northeast Asia into regions in which durable peace and security are settled.
					
					 Respected friends,
					
					 Hoping you will have good impressions during your stay in Russia, let me propose to toast to the good health of respected Your Excellency Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, and to the good health of all those present here and to the well-being and prosperity of the peoples of the DPRK and Russia.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Seen off by Russian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Seen off by Russian President

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, was warmly seen off by Dmitri Anatoliyevich Medvedev, president of the Russian Federation, on Wednesday upon the conclusion of his historical visit to the Russian Federation.
					
					 Present there were Alexandr Avramov, assistant to president for regional policy, Sergei Prikhodiko, assistant to president for external policy, Viktor Ishayev, presidential envoy to the Far East Region of the Russian Federation, Viktor Tolokonski, presidential envoy to the Siberian Region of the Russian Federation, Anatoly Serzhukov, minister of Defense, Igor Levitin, minister of Transport, Viktor Basargin, minister of Regional Development who is chairman of the Russian side to the Governmental Committee between Russia-DPRK for the Cooperation of Trade and Economy, Science and Technology, Valery Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, Aleksei Borodavkin, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Byacheslav Nagovitsin, president of the Republic of Buryatia, Matbei Gershevich, chairman of the People's Khural, Gennadi Aidayev, mayor of Ulan-Ude, Anatoly Sidorov, first vice commander of the Eastern Military District of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, Vladimir Tsilko, comma
					
					 nder of the 36th Combined Forces of the Eastern Military District, and other central and local leading officials and commanding officers of the armed forces.
					
					 Kim Jong Il and Dmitri Anatoliyevich Medvedev exchanged farewell greetings.
					
					 The president hoped that he would meet with General Secretary Kim Jong Il again and sincerely wished him greater success in his important work for building a prosperous and powerful country.
					
					 Kim Jong Il once again extended thanks to the president, the government and the people of Russia for having accorded him cordial hospitality with all sincerity during his visit and wished them new success in the efforts for the economic development of the country and the well-being of the people.
					
					 Kim Jong Il and Dmitri Anatoliyevich Medvedev shook hands with each other before bidding farewell.
					
					 The revisit paid by Kim Jong Il to Russia for steadily strengthening and developing the DPRK-Russia friendship proved successful thanks to the particular concern and hospitality of the Russian president including leading officials of the Russian government and various regions and their people.
					
					 He expressed his satisfaction over the results of the visit and sincere thanks to the Russian people for their warmest hospitality.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's historical visit to Russia will go a long way towards boosting the traditional DPRK-Russia friendship and record another brilliant chapter in its history.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A national meeting to mark the 51st anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership took place at the People's Palace of Culture Wednesday.
					
					 Present there were leading officials of the party, state and army, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media and working people.
					
					  KPA General Kim Jong Gak, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, member of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and first vice-director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, made a report.
					
					 He said: The field guidance provided by Kim Jong Il to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the KPA on August 25, 1960, was a historic declaration that heralded brilliant succession to the Songun revolutionary cause and a noteworthy event as it brought about an occasion of epochal turn in developing the revolutionary armed forces and accomplishing the cause of Juche.
					
					  Kim Jong Il embarked upon the road of Songun leadership, true to the noble intention of President Kim Il Sung, founder of the Songun idea and pioneer of the Songun revolution. He consolidated the foundation of the Songun politics by directing primary efforts to developing the People's Army into the army of the leader and party.
					
					 He formulated the philosophy of arms that the revolution starts, advances and is consummated with arms and the principle of Songun that an army precisely means a party, state and people. He, at the same time, established the Songun politics as a basic political mode of socialism on the basis of an original clarification of the issue of driving force for the revolution, thereby providing effective ideo-theoretical guidelines guaranteeing the triumphant advance of the cause of independence against imperialism.
					
					 It was thanks to the wise leadership of the great brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu that the KPA fully displayed the might of Songun Korea by resolutely foiling the anti-DPRK confrontation rackets of the U.S. imperialists and the puppet group of traitors of south Korea such as "Cheonan" warship sinking case, Yonphyong Island shelling and hideous provocative acts of hurting the ideology and system in the DPRK and the dignity of its leadership.
					
					 It is the steadfast will of the WPK to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche, which started in Mt. Paektu, by dint of Songun generation after generation with the last instructions of the President as important guidelines.
					
					 Having pushed the inter-Korean relations to total collapse since the very day of their seizure of power, the south Korean puppet group of traitors are busy staging large-scale madcap Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises in the wake of the conspiratorial cases and unprecedented provocations against the DPRK in collusion with the U.S. imperialists in a desperate bid to stifle the ideology and system in the DPRK and its cause at any cost.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never pardon the U.S. imperialists and the warmongers of the south Korean puppet army keen to escalate confrontation with the DPRK and ignite a new war quite contrary to the trend of times. They will surely achieve the historic cause of national reunification with the might of Songun they have built up generation after generation.
					
					 Immensely rosy is the future of the army and people of the DPRK advancing under the tested and seasoned leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il and final victory is in store for them.

articles.title: Korean People Make Great Achievements during Kim Jong Il's Russia Visit
articles.content:
Korean People Make Great Achievements during Kim Jong Il's Russia Visit

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are now making great achievements in their work to delight General Secretary Kim Jong Il when he returns home from his unofficial visit to the Siberian and Far East regions of the Russian Federation. 
					
					 The Rangnang Ponghwa Garment Factory has almost attained its monthly target, while the Pyongyang Textile Mill has topped its daily assignments at more than 120 percent.
					
					 The Pyongyang and Pukchang Thermal Power Complexes and other electricity producers are operating all the generating equipment at full capacity and successfully pushing ahead with the project for improving the power distribution system.
					
					 The Musan Mining Complex, a major concentrated iron ore producer of the country, is working on installing large cone-type crusher No. 2.
					
					The Taean Heavy Machine Complex, the country's leading ordered equipment producer, has finished the manufacture of all generating equipment needed for the Huichon Power Station.
					
					 The State Academy of Sciences has dispatched its scientists to the Hwanghae and Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complexes to give them scientific and technological assistance in producing heavy rails and establishing a control system for updating major parts of rolling mill.
					
					 The breakwater project was completed in the construction of Tanchon Port and the housing construction in Mansudae area, Pyongyang, is moving ahead quickly.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Russian Visit Hailed as Great Event
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Russian Visit Hailed as Great Event

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Vorontsov, chief of Section for Korea of the Institute of Oriental Studies of the Russian Academy of Sciences, on a visit to the DPRK had this to say upon hearing the news of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's unofficial visit to Siberia and the Far East Region of the Russian Federation:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's visit to Russia is a great event and it cannot but be an auspicious event for the peoples of the two countries. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il is a great leader. He has paid deep attention to the development of relations with Russia. It has great expectation towards his current visit.
					
					 The visit would contribute to boosting the cooperation between the two countries in different domains.
					
					 He visited the Bureya Hydro-electric Plant, a large power base in the Far East Region of Russia.
					
					 His visit to Russia would mark an important occasion in developing the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries onto a new higher stage.
					
					 I wish Kim Jong Il success in his Russian visit.

articles.title: Chinese Businesses Interested in Business Activities in Rason

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Some 90 Chinese companies, mainly from Jilin and Shandong provinces, exhibit more than 110,000 items in 390 kinds at the 1st Rason International Trade Fair.  
					
					 They include vehicles, consumer goods, building materials and chemical products.
					
					 The China FAW Group Import and Export Corporation and the Siping Fenjin Dedicated Auto Co., Ltd. display cars, buses, trucks and tractors, attracting interest of visitors.
					
					 The Jiangsu Jinghai Transformer Co., Ltd. and Jiangsu Xuemei Refrigeration Equipment Co., Ltd. sent generators, transformers, compressors and coolers to the fair, while the China Yanbian Kangde Network Technology Co., Ltd. put computers and other electric and electronic goods on show.  
					
					 Chinese-made garments, daily necessities and cosmetics are also put on display.
					
					 Suites, winter wear and underwear made by the Hunchun Yunda Knitting and Clothing Co., Ltd. and Jilin Province Liaoyan City Xiyuan Textile Co., Ltd. are in demand for their high quality and fashionable design.
					
					 Chinese businessmen are satisfied with their exhibits enjoying popularity. 
					
					 They are also interested in business activities in the Rason Economic and Trade Zone.

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The workers in the field of light industry are bringing about innovations in the production of consumer goods everyday, inspired by the news of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's visit to the Russian Federation.
					
					 The workers of the Pyongyang Textile Mill are now carrying out their daily production quotas at over 120 per cent with ardent longing for Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Similar successes are reported from the Pyongyang Hosiery Factory and the Sonkyo Knitwear Factory.
					
					 The workers of the Rakrang Ponghwa Garment Factory are close to honoring their monthly plan. Achievements are also reported from the Kyongryon Aeguk Cider Factory and the Taedonggang Beer Factory. 
					
					 Production has reached an all-time high at the Susongchon Combined Foodstuff Factory, the Jongbangsan Combined Foodstuff Factory, the Changsong Foodstuff Factory, the Kanggye Wine Factory, the Hyesan Shoes Factory and the Hamhung Disabled Soldiers Essential Plastic Goods Factory.

articles.content:

					 IFRC praised what he did as a heroic rescue activity.

articles.content:
New Posters Created for World Taekwon-Do Championship

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Posters were created in the DPRK recently with the approach of the 17th World Taekwon-Do Championship.
					
					 The event will be held in Pyongyang from Sep. 6 to 12 under the slogan of justice, peace, friendship and solidarity. 
					
					  Seen in the centre of a poster decorated with confetti on a white ground are the emblem of the championship and letters "WELCOME".
					
					 Another poster contains pictures of trophy, two Taekwon-Do players performing special techniques and Taekwon-Do matches.

articles.title: National Sports Contest among Juvenile Sports Schools Held
articles.content:
National Sports Contest among Juvenile Sports Schools Held

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The 48th national sports contest among juvenile sports schools have been held in Pyongyang, Phyongsong of South Phyongan Province, Wonsan of Kangwon province and other places since it opened on August 3. 
					
					 The contest was divided into two groups - school youth and juvenile. Its participants competed in 35 events including football, basketball, volleyball, table-tennis, track-and-field and gymnastics. 
					
					 Boys and girls of Pyongyang placed first in the first and second categories of football games.
					
					 Boys and girls of Pyongyang came first in the basketball game in the school youth group while boys of South Phyongan Province and girls of the juvenile sports school of Yanggakdo Football Stadium placed first in the weight-lifting event. Boys and girls of the juvenile sports schools of the Swimming Gymnasium in Chongchun Street and those of Pyongyang came first in swimming event and table-tennis games respectively.
					
					 The first place in the basketball and table-tennis games in the juvenile group went to boys and girls of Pyongyang.
					
					 Meanwhile, boys and girls of the maritime juvenile sports school in Pyongyang emerged a winner in the swimming event.
					
					 A closing ceremony was held on Wednesday.

articles.title: Popular Rest System in DPRK
articles.content:
Popular Rest System in DPRK

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Rest homes in different parts of the DPRK are crowded with people.
					
					 Blue and white-collar workers, together with their families, spend a good time at the health resorts and holiday homes at state expense, enjoying sports games, amusements, cooking and singing contests, sightseeing, sea bathing and angling.
					
					 Kwon Phil Su, head of the Rest Management Department of the Ministry of Labor, told KCNA that the state provides funds for the management of rest homes and travel of rest-home visitors.
					
					 The rest homes are open for blue and white-collar workers in spring, summer and autumn and for peasants in winter.
					
					 Thanks to the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea for promoting public welfare, the number of rest homes has reached more than 800 in the country. It was only 7 in the period of the building of a new country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms UFG Provocative and Dangerous
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms UFG Provocative and Dangerous 

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises are exercises for a nuclear war against the DPRK as they brought to light the invariable aggressive nature and dangerous design of the U.S. imperialists to stifle the DPRK by force of arms.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes this in a bylined article.
					
					 The U.S. responded to the patient peace-loving efforts of the DPRK by kicking off the above-said saber-rattling, it notes.
					
					 Revealing the provocative and aggressive nature of UFG and its danger, the article says:
					
					 The on-going UFG marred the atmosphere of dialogue brought to the Korean Peninsula with so much effort and pushed the situation there to the brink of war.
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces openly revealed their intention to ignite the second Korean war. The U.S. and the puppet warmongers hurled into this saber-rattling even military personnel of various satellite countries which took part in the last Korean war. Lurking behind this is a sinister aim to ignite the second Korean war all of a sudden and get their satellite forces involved in it. 
					
					 It was reported that the right to command operations was granted to the chief of staff of the puppet ground force and the chief of staff of the navy in these joint military exercises.
					
					 No one can vouch that those who go reckless with the racket of military confrontation with the DPRK will not ignite a war any time.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the "special action unit" with a mission to detect and destroy the DPRK's nuclear weapons is involved in this saber-rattling.
					
					 It is preposterous, indeed, for them to pressurize the DPRK to dismantle its nuclear deterrent while whetting the sword of aggression behind the scene of dialogue.
					
					 The U.S. had better make a reasonable choice, bearing deep in mind that such saber-rattling can neither browbeat the army and people of the DPRK nor do it good.

articles.title: S. Korean Supreme Court Sentences Worker to Jail Term for Praising DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Supreme Court Sentences Worker to Jail Term for Praising DPRK

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The puppet supreme court of south Korea sentenced a worker to a jail term on August 20 for praising the DPRK and its Songun politics. 
					
					 It took such fascist action against him on charge of violation of the "National Security Law" for posting an article and animation file praising the north on his Internet homepage.
					
					 At the trial that day he proudly stated it was his view that the north has the historical legitimacy of the Korean nation and its Songun idea is an all-powerful treasured sword, throwing puppet elements into consternation.

articles.title: Songun Leadership Exploits Praised by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Songun Leadership Exploits Praised by Foreign Newspapers

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers specially edited photos of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and articles on the 51st anniversary of his start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 The Russian newspaper Patriot No. 31 said that it was very just for Kim Jong Il to start the Songun revolutionary leadership, adding that the Korean People's Army has creditably performed its mission and role as defender of the country and a driving force for socialist construction.
					
					 The Cambodian newspaper Pracheachon on August 17 noted in its article that more than five decades since his start of the Songun revolutionary leadership are a history in which he has led the army and the people of the DPRK to victory.
					
					 The Mexican newspaper Unidad Nacional on August 15 said that the international position and authority of the DPRK have remarkably risen under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A Lao newspaper on August 17 gave a detailed account of the fact that the single-minded unity of the country has been consolidated in every way and astonishing miracles and innovations have been brought about in all fields including the economic construction under his Songun leadership.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Marked Abroad

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A lecture, book and photo exhibition and film show took place in Nepal and Uganda on August 17 and 18  to mark the 51st anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 On display in the venues of the events were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, photos showing their exploits and books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched Korean films including "Arms of Korea".
					
					 Present at the events were personages of the Nepal Communist Party (United Marxist-Leninist), the Unified Communist Party of Nepal (Maoist), the Institute of World Cultural Exchange of Nepal, the Kampala City Committee of the Uganda National Resistance Movement and Kitante Primary School in Kampala City and masses.
					
					 It was stressed at the lecture in Nepal that the independent dignity of the Korean people has been remarkably raised and the DPRK has demonstrated its might as an invincible socialist power which no one dares provoke under his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 The chairman of the Kampala City Committee of the above-said Movement noted that the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il is a deciding factor which made it possible for the DPRK, not a big country, to stand up against the U.S styling itself "the world's only superpower" and protect its sovereignty and dignity and achieve victories only.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Exploits Praised by World Public
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Exploits Praised by World Public

					Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Voices praising General Secretary Kim Jong Il are heard from world public on the 51st anniversary of his start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 The chairman of the Central Committee of the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico extended the warmest congratulations and highest tribute to Kim Jong Il for leading the building of a thriving nation and steering world politics with his Songun politics.
					
					 The chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee said the DPRK has developed into a socialist fortress having the invincible revolutionary armed forces and powerful nuclear deterrent and won one victory after another, frustrating the provocations and moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers for aggression under the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The DPRK has stood up firm against the U.S. styling itself the "only superpower", the Nepali newspaper Rahasha said. Such reality proves that the DPRK is an invincible power which no one dares provoke, it added.
					
					 The Socialist Party of Benin-Baanitee in its statement stressed that the reality of the world today goes to prove that the Songun politics of the DPRK and the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il are the best in the world.
					
					 The chairman of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea noted the DPRK's international position and authority have been remarkably raised and the independent dignity of the Korean people is so high by dint of Songun that it is the irresistible trend of the times to develop relations with the DPRK.
					
					 The chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru stressed the DPRK having powerful defence capability will shed more brilliant rays as a beacon of hope for progressive humankind.

articles.title: American Newspapers on People's Actions against Building of Jeju Naval Base
articles.content:
American Newspapers on People's Actions against Building of Jeju Naval Base

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The New York Times on August 19 reported about the unabated actions against the building of a naval base on Jeju Island, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					
					 When the naval base completed on the Jeju Island, dozens of warships including submarine would be stationed there on a permanent basis and U.S. warships would also anchored there to perform their operational duties in the waters around it, the paper said.
					
					 That is why inhabitants of Kangjong village and anti-war activists are carrying on unabated protest such as sit-in strike for several months, saying the base would play the role of an outpost of the U.S. forces, it noted, and continued:
					
					 Anti-war sentiment of inhabitants there is particularly strong as they still remember the Korean War and Jeju April 3 incident.
					
					 Earlier, the International Herald Tribune reported in detail the local inhabitants are opposed to the construction of the Jeju naval base.

articles.title: UFG Slammed by Peruvian Political Figures
articles.content:
UFG Slammed by Peruvian Political Figures

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Chairman Genaro Ledesma Izquieta and General Secretary Cati Campos of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru issued a joint statement on August 17 denouncing the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities are hurling huge armed forces into the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 UFG is sparking off the unanimous protest of the progressives as it is a fuse to ignite a nuclear war which will inflict damage on the whole mankind.
					
					 The UN and other international organizations the whole world should thoroughly reject the U.S. and the south Korean authorities' provocations against the DPRK.
					
					 They should stop at once the exercises for a war of aggression against the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S. Air Raid on Pakistan
articles.content:
U.S. Air Raid on Pakistan

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The U.S. forces in Afghanistan are committing ceaseless air raids on Pakistan under the pretext of "anti-terrorism".
					
					 At least three people were killed and another two injured in a U.S. drone strike launched Friday afternoon in Pakistan's northwest tribal area of South Waziristan.

articles.title: Joblessness on Increase in U.S.
articles.content:
Joblessness on Increase in U.S.

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The number of jobless people is increasing in the U.S. due to ceaseless economic depression.
					
					 The advance figure for seasonally adjusted initial claims for jobless benefits was 408,000 in the week ending Aug. 13, an increase of 9,000 from the previous week's revised figure, the U.S. Labor Department reported on August 18.

articles.title: U.S. Energy-related Carbon Emissions Up
articles.content:
U.S. Energy-related Carbon Emissions Up 

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Carbon dioxide emissions causing global warming are increasing in the U.S., sparking furor of the international community.
					
					 U.S. carbon dioxide emissions from the consumption of fossil fuels increased in 2010 by 3.9 percent over the previous year, according to an online analysis released on August 18 by the U.S. Department of Energy.

articles.title: Iran Condemns Israeli Military Attacks
articles.content:
Iran Condemns Israeli Military Attacks

					 Tehran, August 23 (KCNA) --Iran's Foreign Ministry spokesman on August 20 strongly condemned new brutal attacks of Zionist regime forces on the fasting and defenseless Palestinians. 
					
					 The spokesman stressed that the attacks were an attempt on the part of the Zionist regime to cover up its own internal problems and distract the regional as well as international public opinion from situation in the occupied territories.
					
					 He further called on international bodies and organizations claiming support for human rights to condemn the anti-human attacks and do their best to prevent repetition of such acts in the Palestinian territories.

articles.title: More Radioactive Substances Detected in Japan
articles.content:
More Radioactive Substances Detected in Japan

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- More radioactive substances are being detected as consequences of the accident at the Fukushima Nuclear Power Plant of Japan.
					
					 Radioactive cesium, which is measured 2,200 becquerels of cesium per kilogram, at a level over four times the government-set safety limit has been detected in the meat of a wild boar captured in Kakuda city, Miyagi Prefecture, the prefectural government said Friday.
					
					 A small amount of radioactive cesium has been detected in rice that was grown in the city of Hokota, Ibaraki Prefecture, the Ibaraki prefectural government said Friday.

articles.title: Economic Depression in Japan, Eurozone
articles.content:
Economic Depression in Japan, Eurozone

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Crude steel production in July dropped 1.2 percent from a year earlier, the fifth straight month of decline, the Japan Iron and Steel Federation quoted the survey data as saying on August 9.
					
					 In the 27-nation EU, production in construction sector also fell by 1.3 percent in June, compared with the previous month, and by 8.1 percent over a year ago, the European Union (EU)'s statistics bureau Eurostat said on Thursday.

articles.title: Exports Increase in Indonesia
articles.content:
Exports Increase in Indonesia

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Indonesia exports in June grew to a record high of 49.35 percent to 18.41 billion U.S. dollar year on year, the National Statistic Bureau has announced recently.

articles.title: Indonesia Explores Ethanol Production
articles.content:
Indonesia Explores Ethanol Production 

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Indonesian government announced it would conduct pilot bioethanol production from palm oil stems.
					
					 The bioethanol is the extract of woody biomass considered more abundant and cheaper than fuel created from food crops.

articles.title: Cooperation among Developing Countries
articles.content:
Cooperation among Developing Countries

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Bangladesh and India on August 18 signed an agreement on cooperation in railway restoration.
					
					 Sierra Leone and the Philippines on August 17 agreed to expand their relations in the political, economic and cultural fields.

articles.title: Deaths Caused by Influenza, Cholera Increase in Cambodia, Dominica
articles.content:
Deaths Caused by Influenza, Cholera Increase in Cambodia, Dominica

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A 6-year-old girl from Kampong Cham province of Cambodia was confirmed died from the case of human infection with avian influenza A (H5N1) virus, the Ministry of Health said on Saturday.
					
					 All eight cases of H5N1 infections in humans in Cambodia this year have been fatal.
					
					 Casualties caused by cholera are expanding in Dominica.
					
					 The number of deaths caused by cholera in the Dominican Republic has increased to 109, and there are 15 876 suspect cases, the Public Health Ministry said on Friday.

articles.title: Natural Disasters in Different Countries
articles.content:
Natural Disasters in Different Countries

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Heavy rains hit Maradi and Tillaberi areas of Niger recently, causing damage.
					
					 Four people were killed, about 890 dwelling houses destroyed and 632 hectares of farmland inundated.
					
					 At least 30 hectares of savannah were devastated as of August 20 in a bush fire which broke out Friday night in the province of Ruyigi, Burundi.
					
					 Last week, bush fires had devastated another 60 hectares of savannah there.
					
					 A strong storm hit Belgian city of Hasselt on Thursday, causing damage.
					
					 The storm accompanied by rain and hail left three people dead and about 70 others wounded.
					
					 The stormy weather also caused a traffic jam.

articles.title: Solar Power Plant Built in Spain
articles.content:
Solar Power Plant Built in Spain 

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Toresol Energy Company of Spain has recently built a solar power plant capable of producing electricity round-the-clock.
					
					 The power plant is made up of 2,650 solar reflectors and heat accumulators distributed in the shape of a pivotal circle in the area covering 185 hectares.
					
					 The plant produces electricity at night, too, with the help of a huge heat accumulator which looks like a steel tower standing in its center. 
					
					 Reflectors focus about 95 percent of solar energy on the accumulators. When it is heated by solar energy, the temperature of melting salt reaches as high as over 500 degrees centigrade. High-pressure steam turns turbines.
					
					 The technology of accumulating heat by use of melting salt is more effective than the use of silicon crystal solar battery.

articles.title: Earthquake Hits Fiji
articles.content:
Earthquake Hits Fiji

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- An earthquake measuring 6.3 on the Richter scale jolted Fiji Islands region on Friday.
					
					 The epicenter was about 540 kilometers north-northwest of Nuku'alofa of Tonga.

articles.title: Egg Production in Cuba
articles.content:
Egg Production in Cuba
						

					 Havana, August 23 (KCNA) -- The June and July plans for egg production were honored in Artemisa, Cuba.
					
					 12 chicken farms there set it as their target to produce 793,000 eggs on a daily average and are working hard to hit it.

articles.title: Express Highway Inaugurated in Cambodia
articles.content:
Express Highway Inaugurated in Cambodia

					 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Cambodia on Tuesday inaugurated a 9-kilometer section of the national road No. 1, which is the main road in the ASEAN highway scheme, connecting Phnom Penh and Vietnam's Ho Chi Minh City. 
					
					 The road will greatly contribute to boosting the economic development of regional countries, a press report said.

articles.title: Botswana Plans to Build Roads
articles.content:
Botswana Plans to Build Roads

					Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Botswanan government plans to build 827 km rural and semi-urban roads in the southern region in order to improve traffic conditions and push forward the economic construction, the government said on August 18.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il se reune con Medvedev
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il se reune con Medvedev

					Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, se reunio el dia 24 con el Presidente de la Federacion Rusa, Dmitri Anatolievich Medvedev, en Ulan-Ude, capital de la Republica de Buryatia.
					
					  Tras intercambiar cordiales saludos, el departio con el mandatario ruso.
					
					  En nombre del gobierno y el pueblo rusos, Medvedev dio calida bienvenida a Kim Jong Il por haber visitado a Rusia a pesar de que esta muy ocupado de su direccion sobre la construccion de un Estado prospero en Corea.
					
					  Agrego que esta visita marcara un hito especial para desarrollar mas a la altura del nuevo siglo las relaciones de amistad entre Rusia y Corea.
					
					  La tercera visita del camarada Kim Jong Il a Rusia en el nuevo siglo corrobora que el concede suma importancia a la amistad Rusia-Corea, dijo y expreso su alta consideracion a el que hace gran aporte al fortalecimiento y al desarrollo de la amistad bilateral.
					
					  Kim Jong Il senalo que esta contento por el encuentro con Su Excelencia Presidente Medvedev y le agradecio por haberle acogido con amabilidad viajando hasta a Ulan-Ude.
					
					  Expreso la impresion que tuvo de su visita al Lejano Oriente y Siberia realizada bajo la gran atencion y trato hospitalario del gobierno y el pueblo de Rusia.
					
					  Las conversaciones transcurrieron en un clima cordial y amistoso.

articles.title: Conversan en Ulan-Ude Kim Jong Il y Medvedev
articles.content:
Conversan en Ulan-Ude Kim Jong Il y Medvedev 

					Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 24 en Ulan-Ude, capital de la Republica de Buryatia de Rusia, las conversaciones entre el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y el Presidente de la Federacion Rusa, Dmitri Anatolievich Medvedev.
					
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana Kim Yong Chun, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, Kang Sok Ju, miembro del BP del CC del PTC y viceprimer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, Kim Yang Gon, miembro suplente del BP y secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Kye Gwan, primer viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores, y Kim Yong Jae, embajador coreano en Rusia.
					
					 Y por la rusa participaron el asistente del presidente para la politica exterior, Serguei Prijodiko, el delegado plenipotenciario del presidente en la Zona Federal del Lejano Oriente, Viktor Ishayev, el delegado plenipotenciario del presidente en la Zona Federal de Siberia, Viktor Tolokonski, el ministro de Defensa, Anatoly Serzhukov, el ministro de Transporte, Igor Levitin, el ministro de Desarrollo Regional, Viktor Basargin, quien es presidente de la parte rusa de la comision intergubernamental para la cooperacion en comercio, economia, ciencia y tecnologia entre Rusia y la RPDC, el embajador ruso en Corea, Valery Sukhinin y el vicecanciller Alexei Borodavkin.
					
					  Medvedev dio calida bienvenida a la visita de   Kim Jong Il a Rusia subrayando que esta visita tiene una importancia especial para fomentar la comprension mutua, la confianza, la amistad y la cooperacion de los dos paises y desarrollar en la nueva etapa las relaciones de amistad Rusia-Corea.
					
					  El hecho de que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il valoro los eventos que acontecen en Rusia en su larga travesia por el Lejano Oriente y Liberia constituye un gran estimulo y apoyo a la lucha del pueblo ruso, dijo Medvedev y evaluo altamente el aporte de    Kim Jong Il por el desarrollo incesante de las relaciones de amistad Rusia-Corea.
					
					  El mandatario ruso mando su saludo cordial a todo el pueblo coreano que lucha abnegadamente por producir nuevo viraje en la construccion de un Estado prospero hasta 2012 en que se acoge el centenario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, gran lider del pueblo coreano.
					
					  Expreso el apoyo a las medidas activas tomadas por la RPDC para defender la paz y la seguridad del Nordeste Asiatico, desarrollar la economia conforme a las realidades del pais y mejorar la vida del pueblo.
					
					Manifesto la conviccion de que bajo la guia del Dirigente, el pueblo coreano lograra mayores exitos en la construccion de un Estado prospero.
					
					Kim Jong Il expreso agradecimiento a Medvedev y otros cuadros directivos de la direccion central de Rusia, varios gobiernos y pueblos regionales, que le acogieron amablemente en los lugares visitados y le agasajaron durante toda la visita, y envio saludo al pueblo ruso.
					
					  Dijo que durante su visita a varias ciudades y entidades del extenso Lejano Oriente y Siberia, ha sito testigo de los exitos logrados por el gobierno y pueblo rusos bajo la direccion de Su Excelencia Presidente Medvedev en las labores por la modernizacion de la economia, el fortalecimiento de la capacidad de defensa nacional y estabilidad social y pudo conocer mejor la historia y la cultura.
					
					  Deseo que el pueblo ruso logre la prosperidad en lo adelante tambien.
					
					  Los lideres de los dos paises informaron en la ocasion la situacion de los respectivos paises, apreciaron con satisfaccion el desarrollo positivo de  las relaciones Corea-Rusia, intercambiaron las opiniones relacionadas con el desarrollo de las relaciones bilaterales y llegaron al consenso en todos los temas debatidos.
					
					  Coincidieron en que consolidar y desarrollar mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion Corea-Rusia con larga tradicion historica conviene al deseo e interes principal de ambos pueblos y tienen mucha importancia para el desarrollo regional del Nordeste Asiatico y para la paz y seguridad del mundo.
					
					  Medvedev subrayo que la parte rusa contribuira a ofrecer mayor bienestar a los pueblos de ambos paises al desarrollar mas con la parte coreana las relaciones de buena vecindad, amistad y cooperacion Rusia-Corea.
					
					  Kim Jong Il expreso una vez mas la decision del gobierno y el pueblo coreanos de esforzarse por desarrollar mas en el futuro las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion Corea-Rusia.
					
					  En la ocasion se hizo enfasis en ampliar y fortalecer las relaciones de amistad, igualdad y cooperacion de beneficio mutuo entre los dos paises en base al espiritu de la Declaracion Conjunta Corea-Rusia firmada en Pyongyang en 2000, la Declaracion Corea-Rusia de Moscu de 2001 y al tratado de amistad, buena vecindad y cooperacion entre la RPDC y la FR.
					
					  Los dignatarios de ambos paises expresaron la firme conviccion de que se cumpliran sin falta la causa de construccion de un Estado prospero en Corea y la de edificacion de un Estado poderoso en Rusia, paises en que se libran en la lucha dinamica de los pueblos de los dos paises por el progreso social y desarrollo, y manifestaron reciprocamente el apoyo y la solidaridad a esas empresas.
					
					  Intercambiaron amplias opiniones sobre los problemas regionales e internacionales.
					
					  Coincidieron en reanudar cuando antes sin condiciones las conversaciones a 6 bandas para ejecutar la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de septiembre en el principio de accion simultanea y adelantar la desnuclearizacion de toda la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  En la ocasion se expreso la voluntad de los gobiernos de Corea y Rusia de contribuir mucho a la paz y la seguridad de la region y el mundo al establecer un imparcial orden intencional rechazando en la escena mundial el despotismo y arbitrariedades.
					
					  Ademas, se plantearon los problemas sobre el mayor desarrollo en varios dominios de las relaciones de cooperacion economica como gas, energia y conexion de ferrocarril y se logro el entendimiento comun de ellos.
					
					   Se acordo organizar y operar los grupos de trabajo para cumplir esos proyectos y seguir cooperando en esta direccion.
					
					 Los mandatarios se mostraron satisfechos del resultado de las conversaciones y profundizaron mas las relaciones de amistad.
					
					  Kim Jong Il invito a Medvedev a visitar a Corea en el tiempo que le convenga y la invitacion fue aceptada con gratitud. 
					
					Las conversaciones transcurrieron en un clima sincero y amistoso.

articles.title: Medvedev ofrece banquete en honor de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Medvedev ofrece banquete en honor de Kim Jong Il

					Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente de la Federacion Rusa, Dmitri Anatolievich Medvedev, ofrecio el dia 24 por la noche en la Casa de Huespedes de Estado del Presidente en la ciudad de Ulan-Ude un solemne banquete en honor del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, de visita en Rusia.

articles.title: Discurso de Kim Jong Il pronunciado en el banquete
articles.content:
Discurso de Kim Jong Il pronunciado en el banquete

					Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il pronuncio un discurso en el banquete de bienvenida ofrecido en su honor por el Presidente de la Federacion Rusa, Dmitri Anatolievich Medvedev.
					
					  El discurso sigue:
					
					  Su Excelencia Presidente Dmitri Anatolievich Medvedev,
					
					  Amigos entranables de Rusia,
					
					  Estoy muy contento por reunirme con el Presidente Medvedev al volver a visitar a los 10 anos a Siberia y el Lejano Oriente de Rusia, vecino amistoso.
					
					  Sobre todo, quisiera agradecer de todo corazon al Presidente Medvedev quien nos ha acogido con hospitalidad y ha preparado esta ocasion significativa trasladandose hasta a Ulan-Ude, a miles de kilometros de la capital Moscu.
					
					  Estamos especialmente satisfechos por poder presenciar directamente los exitos logrados por el pueblo ruso en el curso de construccion de una Rusia poderosa y modernizada durante nuestra tercera visita a Rusia en el nuevo siglo.
					
					  Hoy dia, el gobierno y el pueblo rusos alcanzan muchos exitos en las labores para fortalecer la capacidad de defensa nacional del pais, modernizar la economia y conseguir la estabilidad sociopolitica y se esfuerzan ingentemente por establecer un imparcial orden internacional rechazando el despotismo y arbitrariedades.
					
					  Deseamos de todo corazon que den magnificos resultados los esfuerzos del amistoso gobierno y el pueblo de Rusia por preservar la paz y la seguridad del mundo y construir una Rusia prospera.
					
					  Los pueblos de nuestros dos paises vinieron dando continuidad a la historia y a las tradiciones de amistad al igual que la corriente invariable del rio Tuman.
					
					  Estamos complacidos de que ultimamente, se desarrollen positivamente las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises.
					
					  Profundizar y desarrollar de continuo la historia y la tradicion de la amistad Corea-Rusia convienen enteramente a los intereses de nuestros dos pueblos y tienen suma importancia en preservar la paz y la estabilidad del Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					  Estamos convencidos de que la cumbre de hoy sera indudablemente una ocasion importante para desarrollar las relaciones Corea-Rusia conforme a la aspiracion y el deseo de los pueblos de los dos paises y transformar la region del Nordeste Asiatico como area de paz y cooperacion.
					
					  Seguiremos esforzandonos en todo lo posible por desarrollar aun mas las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion Corea-Rusia.
					
					  Finalmente, aprovecho esta ocasion de rebosante sentimiento de amistad para brindar por el fortalecimiento de las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea y Rusia, por la salud de Su Excelencia Presidente Dmitri Anatolievich Medvedev y por los intimos amigos rusos y otros presentes en esta recepcion.

articles.title: Discurso de Medvedev pronunciado en el banquete
articles.content:
Discurso de Medvedev pronunciado en el banquete

					Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- Sigue abajo el texto integro del discurso pronunciado en el banquete por el Presidente de la Federacion Rusa, Dmitri Anatolievich Medvedev:
					
					  Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il,
					
					  Respetados amigos,
					
					  Ha terminado hace poco el encuentro de trabajo entre yo y Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  Agradezco a Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il por el eficiente intercambio de opiniones sobre los apremiantes problemas bilaterales e internacionales y vuelvo a dar bienvenida a todos los huespedes coreanos de visita en Rusia.
					
					  Las relaciones de buena vecindad entre nuestros dos paises tienen una solida base.
					
					  Eso no se debe solamente a la cercania geografica o a la larga historia de relaciones bilaterales.
					
					  Tiene gran potencialidad la cooperacion entre Rusia y la RPDC.
					
					  La marcha de la cooperacion entre los dos paises dara muchos beneficios a los pueblos de nuestros dos paises, inclusive no pocos resultados economicos.
					
					  Hoy, yo y Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il acordamos continuar el dialogo politico y desarrollar en sentido global la cooperacion practica.
					
					  En las ramas de educacion y cultura tenemos muchas posibilidades de cooperacion.
					
					  En Pyongyang opera ya por 3 anos el centro del ruso y los estudiantes coreanos estudian o pasan el curso de produccion en las universidades rusas.
					
					  Las bandas artisticas de Rusia siguen realizando la gira por la RPDC y es ya una tradicion participar en el Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera.
					
					  Ultimamente, toman auge los contactos entre las regiones de ambos paises.
					
					  Se elaboran los documentos sobre el hermanamiento entre varias ciudades rusas y coreanas.
					
					  En el cumplimiento de grandes proyectos de infraestructura y rama energetica, tiene grandes perspectivas la cooperacion entre Rusia, la RPDC y la Republica de Corea.
					
					  Estoy convencido de que esa cooperacion conviene a nuestros 3 paises e influenciara positivamente en preparar el ambiente favorable al dialogo y a la creacion de confianza entre la RPDC y la Republica de Corea.
					
					  Pienso que tenemos la tarea comun de poner punto final al enfrentamiento entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea, que persiste durante mas de medio siglo.
					
					  Seguiremos contribuyendo a buscar las soluciones politico-economicas que puedan convertir la Peninsula Coreana y el Nordeste Asiatico en una region de paz duradera y seguridad.
					
					  Estimados amigos,
					
					  Propongo este brindis por la buena impresion de ustedes de su visita a Rusia, por la salud de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il, Presidente del CDN de la RPDC, y los demas presentes aqui  y por el bienestar y la prosperidad de los pueblos coreano y ruso.

articles.title: Acto central por 51o aniversario de guia del Songun de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Acto central por 51o aniversario de guia del Songun de Kim Jong Il 

					Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este miercoles en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 51o aniversario del inicio de la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun. 
					
					Asistieron los cuadros del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los funcionarios de organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, las entidades sociales, los ministerios y los organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y de las Fuerzas Populares del Interior de Corea, los funcionarios de las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion y los trabajadores capitalinos. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del general de ejercito del Ejercito Popular de Corea Kim Jong Gak,  miembro suplente del Buro Politico del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, miembro del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC. 
					
					El 25 de agosto del 49 (1960) de la Era Juche el Dirigente Kim Jong Il dirigio en el terreno la Division Guardia de Tanques 105 "Seul" Ryu Kyong Su del EPC, lo cual fue una declaracion historica sobre la continuacion de la causa revolucionaria del Songun y un acontecimiento especial que trajo un motivo trascendental en el desarrollo de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias y en el cumplimiento de la causa del Juche, senalo el informante y continuo: 
					
					Al emprender la direccion del Songun en pleno acato al noble proposito del Presidente Kim Il Sung, creador de la idea del Songun e iniciador de la revolucion homonima, el Dirigente dio atencion primordial a fortalecer el EPC como el ejercito de lider y de partido y consolido firmemente la base de la politica de Songun. 
					
					Formulo la filosofia del fusil de que la revolucion comienza, avanza y se completa por las fuerzas armadas, y los principios del Songun de que el ejercito es el partido, el Estado y el pueblo.
					
					Y a base de la aclaracion original sobre el grueso de la revolucion, definio la politica de Songun como el modo politico principal socialista. De esta manera, preparo la gran guia ideo-teorica que posibilita  garantizar el avance victorioso de la causa de la independencia antiimperialista. 
					
					Gracias a la sabia orientacion del gran General Insigne del Paektu, el EPC pudo demostrar el poderio de la Corea del Songun frustrando tajantemente  la campana conflictiva anti-RPDC  de los imperialistas norteamericanos y la banda titere del Sur de Corea tales como el caso de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan", el incidente de canonazo en la isla Yonphyong y otras provocaciones que denigran la idea, el regimen y la maxima dignidad de la RPDC. 
					
					Considerar el legado del Presidente como guia programatica y llevar a feliz termino de generacion en generacion con el poderio del Songun la causa revolucionaria del Juche, es la firme voluntad del PTC. 
					
					Desde el primer dia de su mandato la banda titere del Sur de Corea llevo las relaciones intercoreanas a la ruptura total e invento con EE.UU. groseros complots anti-RPDC y perpetro acciones  provocativas sin precedentes. Y  no satisfecho con esto, esta desarrollando los ejercicios militares conjuntos de gran envergadura "Ulji Freedom Guardian" con el designio de aplastar de todos modos la idea, el regimen y la causa de la RPDC. 
					
					El ejercito y pueblo de Corea no perdonaran ni en lo minimo el alboroto conflictivo anti-RPDC y las maniobras de provocacion de nueva guerra de los imperialistas norteamericanos y de las fuerzas belicistas de la capa militar surcoreana, que marchan a contrapelo de la tendencia de la epoca, y lograran sin falta con el poderio del Songun la causa historica de la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					Sera mas radiante el futuro del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea que avanzan siguiendo la probada y veterana direccion del Comandante Supremo       Kim Jong Il y el triunfo final sera el de la RPDC.
